data.name: Greek salad
data.about: The famous greek salad of crispy lettuce, peppers, olives and our Chicago style feta cheese, garnished with crunchy garlic and rosemary croutons.

data.name: Bruchetta
data.about: Our Bruschetta is made from grilled bread that has been smeared with garlic and seasoned with salt and olive oil.
